name: Auroraforecast
0:
”Alexa, open aurora forecast”
”Alexa, start aurora forecast”
”Alexa, launch aurora forecast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aurora forecast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Aurora forecast gives you informations about aurora borealis in different locations. It will give you the probability to see an aurora now, overhead and within 1000km. It will also give you the current bz, proton speed, proton density and kp for each location.

Locations available : 
Svalbard, Norway
Alberta, Canada
Victoria, Australia
Pennsylvania, United States
More locations are to come. 

Powered by Auroras.live
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
